"Why not try something new? You might be surprised by what you're capable of."
"Remember when you were a kid and you didn't know anything was impossible?"
"What if your biggest obstacle is yourself? Try challenging your negative self-talk and replace it with positive affirmations."
"Who cares if you don't know how to do something? Just start doing it and learn as you go."
"Imagine if someone else had given up on you because they thought you couldn't do it. How would that make you feel?"
